sentences.english: A level two reiki attunement allows one to heal graver maladies and emotional ills.
sentences.chinese: 第二阶段灵气点化允许疗愈深刻病疾和情绪问题。

sentences.english: Right now, I am talking about how energy healing works.
sentences.chinese: 现在，我谈谈能量疗愈是如何进行的。

sentences.english: What you offer someone else if you mean to offer spiritual healing is really a change of perception.
sentences.chinese: 在灵性疗愈中你真正提供给别人的是觉知的改变。

sentences.english: Emotional healing is about taking better care of your physical body as well as your inner self.
sentences.chinese: 情绪疗愈是指更好地照顾自己身体及内在的自我。

sentences.english: Self healing occurs when there is love available to draw upon.
sentences.chinese: 自我疗愈是当可得到爱来汲取的时候而发生。

sentences.english: Aloe vera can also be ingested to help heal chronic problems in the stomach or intestines .
sentences.chinese: 芦荟汁也可以被摄取来帮助疗愈慢性肠胃问题。

sentences.english: I intend to anchor the new blueprint for the space between through the Healing Temples for Ascension.
sentences.chinese: 我意愿透过提升的疗愈圣殿为两极空间锚定新蓝图。

sentences.english: It will be their choice what to do with the healing space you offer.
sentences.chinese: 是否以及如何利用你提供的疗愈空间是他们的选择。

sentences.english: I intend to visit the Healing Temples for Ascension each night during dreamtime.
sentences.chinese: 我意愿在我的梦想时间中每晚拜访提升的疗愈圣殿。

sentences.english: Things and people show up spontaneously on your path and turn to you for healing.
sentences.chinese: 事物和人会自发的出现在你的道路上并向你寻求疗愈。

sentences.english: Some herbs may only require communing with our kingdom and the healing will be provided.
sentences.chinese: 有些药草可能只需要和我们王国交流，疗愈就能提供。

sentences.english: The Willow Moon is a time to heal spiritual and physical ills.
sentences.chinese: 柳月是一个绝佳时间用来疗愈精神和身体的问题。

sentences.english: A first level reiki attunement allows one to heal himself and others of minor discomforts .
sentences.chinese: 第二阶段灵气点化允许疗愈深刻病疾和情绪问题。

definition: Ayurveda (ancient Indian system and health care philosophy)
